node.title: Halvah, Sufganiyot and Babka Chocolates for Hanukkah
node.description: Hanukkah Chic from Chocolat Moderne features eight filled chocolates with flavors of the season.
node.content: ["Along with Hanukkah gelt there are Hanukkah goodies. Chocolates with evocative fillings like coconut macaroon, halvah, raspberry sufganiyot and walnut babka are this year\u2019s innovation from Chocolat Moderne in Chelsea. The decorated pieces come in a sleeve of eight ($29), one for each night of the holiday, and boxes of 12 ($49) and 24 ($79) pieces.", "Follow NYT Food on Twitter and NYT Cooking on Instagram, Facebook and Pinterest. Get regular updates from NYT Cooking, with recipe suggestions, cooking tips and shopping advice."]
